title: Notice of A Home in Africa - significance

content.question: Which of the following best explains the significance of the statement “to settle to help in the industrial, commercial and cultural development of the country, and who intend sailing”?

choices.label: African Americans relocated in search of safety for their families.
Marcus Garvey’s literature was a key feature of the Harlem Renaissance.
Marcus Garvey founded a steamship company called the Black Star Line to support African Americans in immigrating to Africa.
African Americans established the Universal Negro Improvement Association to support Afro-Caribbean immigrants.

content.answer: Marcus Garvey founded a steamship company called the Black Star Line to support African Americans in immigrating to Africa.

skill.text: 1.B: Identify and explain the context of a specific event, development, or process.
